name: Tony Paul
description: My name is tony paul i am from Italy and was born in Greece But raise here in the state.. My parent die to cancer when i was 21, I am single and a widow lost my wife 2 years and half Ago to an Auto Crash Accident in Texas …she left me with 1 kid jenny she is 3 years plus..i am new on this site and i don’t really know who to talk too and looking for someone to show me around…when i just come on your profile i have to pause..wow you are such a beautiful woman and a good looking one..i wonder what a very beautiful woman like you is doing on this social site..i like everything i read here on your profile..and i will like to know you more maybe from there you also can get to know me better.
